get.summary: Get all data points from an act
get.description: Get all data points from an act.

401.description: A valid authentication token was not provided with the request

requestBody.description: Updates multiple data points in a single request. Each item must include either id or template_field_id.

data.description: List of data point updates for this act.

id.description: The data point ID from the act data list. Use either id or template_field_id.

template_field_id.description: The template field ID to locate the data point. Use either id or template_field_id.

value.description: The new value for the data point. Validation rules depend on the field type.

401.description: A valid authentication token was not provided with the request

parameters.name: dataId
parameters.description: The ID of the data point

requestBody.description: Updates a single data point value by ID.

value.description: The new value for the data point. Validation rules depend on the field type.

401.description: A valid authentication token was not provided with the request

get.summary: Get a template with full structure

uuid.description: The unique identifier of the act.

client_id.description: The client ID this act belongs to.

template_id.description: The template ID used to create the act.

amount.description: The requested or approved amount for the act.

currency.description: The ISO currency code for the amount.

language.description: The language code for the act.

created_at.description: The date when this act was created

updated_at.description: The date when this act was last updated

uuid.description: The unique identifier of the act.

client_id.description: The client ID this act belongs to.

template_id.description: The template ID used to create the act.

template_name.description: The template name used to create the act.

amount.description: The requested or approved amount for the act.

currency.description: The ISO currency code for the amount.

language.description: The language code for the act.

created_at.description: The date when this act was created

updated_at.description: The date when this act was last updated

org_number.description: The organization number of the client

created_at.description: The date when this client was created

updated_at.description: The date when this client was last updated

org_number.description: The organization number of the client

credit_limit.description: The credit limit of the client

credit_limit_currency.description: The currency of the credit limit

street_address.description: The street address of the client

zip_code.description: The zip code of the client

contact_person_name.description: The name of the contact person for the client

contact_person_email.description: The email of the contact person for the client

contact_person_phone.description: The phone number of the contact person for the client

credit_rating.description: The credit rating of the client

credit_rating_source.description: The source of the credit rating

created_at.description: The date when this client was created

updated_at.description: The date when this client was last updated

data.description: A list of data points for the act.

id.description: The data point ID within the act.

template_field_id.description: The template field ID this data point is derived from.

name.description: The field label as defined in the template.

type.description: The field type used to validate and render the value.

value.description: The stored value for the data point.

required.description: Whether the field is required in the template.

section_id.description: The section ID the field belongs to.

tab_id.description: The tab ID the field belongs to.

order.description: The position of the field within its section.

country.description: The country code the template is associated with.

language.description: The language code used by the template.

created_at.description: The date when this template was created

updated_at.description: The date when this template was last updated

name.description: The field label shown to users.

type.description: The field type used to validate input.

options.description: Field options such as select values or validation settings.

order.description: The field order within its section.

country.description: The country code the template is associated with.

language.description: The language code used by the template.

tabs.description: Ordered tabs that make up the template structure.

order.description: The tab order in the template.
The section order within the tab.

created_at.description: The date when this template was created

updated_at.description: The date when this template was last updated
